By Eagle Fierce on Thursday, March 14, 2002 - 11:00 pm:

"Wall" isn't a DGE type of card, it's a BLK(unless I have it confused with Shock Breath. Still, I think that both are BLK type of cards). Even if an attack cannot be dodged, it can still be blocked. Hence, that was a legal maneuver.

By TemateBaku on Wednesday, May 5, 2004 - 02:11 pm:

Pixie's Bolt is dodgeable; it's Pixie's Lightning that can't be dodged.
